This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10, 11 and 12

Wake Info 2 is the ultimate alarm experience. Now available and specially optimized for iOS8+ with new features and improvements.
Wake Info 2 allows your device to speak out useful information in form of a spoken custom message right after you dismiss or snooze the alarm. You can get information such as:

-        Weather based on auto location detection or for a predefined city,
-        Current location,
-        Battery charge percentage,
-        Calendar events for the day,
-        Reminders for the day,
-        Unread e-mail,
-        Unread SMS/iMessages/What’s app,
-        Missed calls

You can also configure Wake Info 2 to announce your custom message instead of the alarm sound, that you way you can hear custom information right at the morning without even touching your device.
Besides that, you can open a website or assign activator actions which fire right after you wake up.
You can set different custom messages for the dismiss action and other custom messages for the snooze action allowing you to completely customize the information that you want to get at the beginning of the day. You can also listen to your custom messages by triggering activator actions.
Wake Info 2 also gives you the possibility to display a badge on the Clock app with the number of active alarms.
